name: Escape The Lab (itch) (twodotsixk)
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Theme: Stronger Together

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

arrows - movement

space bar - jump

R - restart level

C - change camera while you have clones

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This is not my first game but is the first that i did for a game jam and the first i did everything by myself. It was very challenging and i am very proud of the final result, even though, i think the level design is not the best and i have a lot to work if some day i need to polish this game for a final release.

I  hope you like.

If you like my work, specially the music, you can check out my instagram and bandcamp at:

https://www.instagram.com/twodotsixk/

https://deliriorecords.bandcamp.com/album/sinkhole

Big thanks to managore for the font:

https://managore.itch.io/m3x6

And to xphere for the keyboard keys sprites:

https://xphere.itch.io/pixel-keyboard-layout
